name: Karahi Qeema Recipe | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Karahi Qeema Recipe: Mince 750 gm Ginger garlic paste 1 tbsp Oil ½ cup Tomatoes grinded 4 Green chilies chopped 4 Salt 1 tsp Prepared masala 4 tbsp Whipped yogurt ½ cup Coriander leaves 2 tbsp Mint leaves 1 tbsp Ginger julienne
instructions: Heat oil in a karahi, add ginger garlic paste, fry for 5 mins. Add sliced tomatoes, fry well. Add mince, cover and cook for 15 minutes. Add in Qeema masala, yogurt, fry well. Add green chilies, when mince tender. Lastly add chopped greens. Serve with nan.
